name: ThrusterBuster
description:
Take your homebuilt Thruster Bike through various obstacles to reach the goal in the end of each track in the shortest time possible.

Credits go to:

Unity 3D, thanks for the possibility to attend to Create with Code Live Summer 2020

Realistic tree. Rakshi games
Jet engine Banism24 (Turbosquid)
shui861wy Free rock pack
Music Adam Bielecki Surfing on the sun
Low poly props pack Indie_G
